question.title: AWS Java SDK 2.x ProfileCredentialsProvider support multiple profile names
question.body: I am creating an application which needs to access AWS resources by all of my team members. I have used ProfileCredentialsProvider for authentication to AWS. It picks the 'default' profile by default. But some of my team members have a different/custom profile names. Is it possible to configure ProfileCredentialsProvider to pick any available profile name in the .aws/credentials file without restrictions?
